6:["$","section",null,{"className":"py-16","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto px-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-3xl mx-auto","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold mb-6","children":["About ","Buenos Aires (CABA)"]}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"Buenos Aires isn't just Argentina's capital — it's the beating heart of South American culture. From the cobblestone streets of San Telmo to the tree-lined boulevards of Palermo, CABA offers an intensity of experience that few cities can match. The tango halls of La Boca, the bookshops of Corrientes, the steakhouses of Puerto Madero — every neighborhood is its own universe. For expats, BA offers the best infrastructure in Argentina: reliable internet, international schools, coworking spaces on every corner, and a social scene that never sleeps. The trade-off? It's the most expensive city in the country, and the pace can be relentless."}]]}]}]}]
